title: yafi
text:
i'm a junior at penn state studying cs and math and learning a bunch more stuff. i love playing soccer 
                    and bouldering. apart from that i still continue to build and design fun things and love understanding 
                    things i don't understand.

i'm interested in full-stack development and ai/ml. i'm currently learning and working on research with 
                    fine-tuning models and reinforcement learning. over the summer, i interned at jade global as a full-stack developer and made an internal tool to help with getting leads with the help of snowflake. 
                    i'm also a learning assistant for a computer architecture class which is pretty nice.
Welcome to my corner of the internet.
developed an internal tool to help get leads with over 50k job records
built an ai chatbot with snowflake cortex assisting in getting analysis of job postings helping find relevant leads
helped with development of video query system for students to search for specific parts in recorded lectures
got interested in cs and math
met really smart people and traveled to different places with friends
Please feel free to reach out at yafi [at] psu [dot] edu
built with care in jubail Â· v2.0.0
